org.cobogw.gwt.user.client
Class JSString

java.lang.Object
  org.cobogw.gwt.user.client.JSString

public class JSString
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains JavaScript string object methods that generate specific HTML tags around a String. e.g. the JavaScript method big() wraps a string into the <big> tag.

The style created by the HTML tags, made available through the methods in this class, can also be created via CSS style elements. This latter technique is preferred as it better separates code from layout. Therefore be careful when using the methods to set specific style effects.

Additional 2 useful JavaScript methods are also made accessible: split(String, String, int) and substr(String, int, int). These methods provide functionality not available in the Java String class.

This class would have been an extension of String if that class hadn't been final.
